author: jackfido
body:

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @jackfido PowerShell Core will support Ubuntu 18.04 since 6.1.0 version. You can test with latest nightly builds. 6.1.0 version is based on .Net Core 2.1 and haven't curl dependency.
